articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Malaysian player Halim walking again after acid attack - ESPN
articles.description: Malaysian footballer Faisal Halim has responded well to a third surgery and can walk after being left in critical condition from an acid attack, state news agency Bernama reported on Friday.
articles.content:
May 10, 2024, 09:03 AM ET
Faisal Halim was left with fourth-degree burns after being splashed with acid at a mall. Getty
